verbs.description: As [ARG1: this year ’s Met Gala] [V: approaches] , a reminder that President Donald Trump proposed to Melania Knauss at the 2004 Met Gala .
As this year ’s Met Gala approaches , a reminder that [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: proposed] [ARG3: to Melania Knauss] [ARGM-LOC: at the 2004 Met Gala] .
